modName: An Alternative Start - Holranvar a nord guard - for Role Pla
summary: Holranvar\'s day was going great, but then a dragon attacked.
descriptionHtml:
Raised in Whiterun hold, Holranvar fell in love with it.  As a young lad he ventured to the other holds of Skyrim but always longed to return to Whiterun.  When he came of age he signed up for the hold guards.  After 3 years of service, he\'s become very proficient with his trusty greatsword.  You, the player, take control of Holranvar when he needs those skills most, when a Dragon is attacking his fair city.  He and the other guards maybe a little worried about their chances of survival, but he isn\'t going to let a Dragon burn down his hold.  

This is a alternative start save.  His skills are:
All magic skills at 0 because nords despise magic
Smithing is at 20 since Guards would have to sharpen their own swords once in a while
Heavy and Light armor are at 30 because Holranvar uses a mix of both
Block, archery and one handed are at 20 because of basic guard training
Speech is at 20 because he does sometimes try to get criminals to come quietly
All other sneak skills are at 0 since no true nord should be sneaking when he can charge in head first

Requirements:     
Various Guards Outfit for Every City TS Edition (for the armor worn in the screenshots, if you don\'t install this mod then the outfit will be the regular guard outfit)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6770

Credits:
AOF Believable Hair-Female and Male- (I used this to boost the hair quality in the screenshot)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4307

XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement (I used this to boost the characters looks in the screenshot)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356
